body: Also, chill Anti-NTR people. This wasn't even canon, trust me I know what you guys feels. Just think if it as a dream of a certain people that will never be achieved. Sagiri is a good character after all, her fans exist in both NTR and non-NTR groups.
would be great if this series get translated
fuck the ntr doujins rly those who like that can die...
The characters aren't living beings, I don't like ntr but its okay for people to post it, different strokes for different folks

Complaining on how ntr succ and shit<

Meh, doesnt matter if its banilla or ntr, as long as you can achieve ogasum everything doesnt matter.

Before we all scream NTR let's just have a moment and think about this 

These types of doujins where they use characters from an established story dont really blend with ntr. . . . unless it's based on a gacha or a nigga gets his harem snatched. Ya know some shit. 

Anyway these dont work too well because unless the characters are established lovers it ain't ntr it's just a girl fuckin a different dude than the mc, and why give a shit? The mc don't lol 

I ain't a fan of ntr but let's not go ape shit everytime it pops up 

That's all I had to say

The person below me have problems, and soon another person with problems will comment after me, I dunno what's with people hating NTR and all cause it only happens in doujins, it's like them moron parents who thought they're smart and didn't allow their kids to have vaccine.
